items.name: Woe Barb
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
1% increased Critical Strike Chance per 4% Quality
explicitMods: 20% increased Spell Damage
+12% to Damage over Time Multiplier
+1 to Level of all Spell Skill Gems
+1 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
fracturedMods: 103% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

properties.name: Attack, AoE, Movement, Travel, Physical, Melee

socketedItems.secDescrText: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing off-hand damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.
explicitMods: 134 to 200 Base Off Hand Physical Damage
5 to 7 Added Physical Damage per 15 Armour or Evasion Rating on Shield
75% increased Stun Threshold reduction on enemies at Maximum charge distance
100% more Damage with Hits at Maximum Charge Distance
129% increased Movement Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 54% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1975.3 Base Fire Damage per second
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Deals 749 to 1123 Fire Damage
30% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate

items.name: Profane Proxy
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
+29% to Cold Resistance
+25% to Lightning Resistance

Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Cold, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
11% increased Effect of Curse
Cursed enemies have -36% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: 15% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 7% increased Damage taken to Enemies
129% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: +58 to Strength
+62 to Dexterity
+53 to maximum Life
26% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.

Minions have 19% increased Chill Effect
Minions have 19% increased Shock Effect
Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 1.00 seconds
20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
26% less Elemental Damage taken
26% less Physical Damage taken
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 38 or lower
Supported Skills deal 65% less Damage
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 528 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon Skeleton Warrior minions at the targeted location. They use a melee attack and die after a duration. If made aggressive, Skeleton Warriors will also dash towards nearby enemies.

Minions deal 5% increased Damage
Summons 4 Skeleton Warriors

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
9% increased Attack Speed
+54 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Mine lasts 5 seconds
Supported Skills have 10% increased Mine Throwing Speed
Supported Skills gain a Base Reservation equal to Base Mana and Life Cost
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Supported Skills deal 50% less Damage
Each Mine from Supported Skills applies 2% chance to deal Double Damage to Hits against Enemies near it, up to a maximum of 100%

socketedItems.secDescrText: Deals chaos damage to a single enemy, dealing more damage if they are Hexed, then removing the Hex. If the enemy was Hexed, also deals area damage to other enemies around the target, boosting damage and removing Hexes from those enemies in the same way.

This Spell's Cast Time is added to its Cooldown if Triggered
